website_summaries.verdict: The high-potency formula of this supplement is non-GMO and all-natural, meaning that it contains no allergens, gluten, or preservatives.
pros: Formula consists of 95% curcuminoids, along with bioperine (black pepper extract) to improve absorption
Buyers found it effective, particularly for arthritis
cons: Some side effects reported include gas, nausea/stomach cramps, and insomnia
A small percentage of buyers said they experienced no noticeable pain relief taking this

customer_reviews.title: Decreased pain and swelling!
customer_reviews.text: Having fibromyalgia and osteoarthritis I am familiar with daily pain in my joints. Since taking the Tumeric Curcumin I can tell a noticeable improvement in the pain and swelling. It also seems to give me a burst of energy. Will not be without it again!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Dunfee

customer_reviews.title: Arthritis pain is gone.
customer_reviews.text: I was taking a lot of pain medicine for my arthritis. Now since I take the turmeric almost all my pain is gone. And it’s much safer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reduced swelling dramatically!
customer_reviews.text: This is really high quality potent Tumeric Curcumin. The fact that it's all natural and free from any fillers, binders or preservatives makes it much purer than what the other brands have to offer. I tend to look into natural ways to cure the problem instead of relying on NSAIDs and other harmful medications. I initially started with 1 capsule, then 2 and gradually increased to 3 per day. After 1 week I noticed my leg swelling has dramatically reduced. I recommend taking it with a warm glass of milk. I'll continue taking this brand and gradually cut down the dosage once my swelling is completely gone. A wonderful product all around.
customer_reviews.author: Zain

customer_reviews.title: Check dosage and amount of curcumanoid extract
customer_reviews.text: 1 serving is 3 pills which only gives you 150mg of 95% curcumanoid extract. I read that you need 400-500mg of the extract to feel the benefits. The rest of the ingredients have minimal effect. It’s just for hype. You have to read the servings and look for the “curcuminoid extract” not the “longa root”.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: I beat arthritis!
customer_reviews.text: Advil didn't work. Steroid shots didn't work. Nothing worked. The doctors couldn't tell me why I was in such pain with my knee that was swollen almost double the size the the other one. Then I discovered this product. I am pain free, the swelling is gone and I am so very happy. I was skeptical, but I can tell you with my hand on a Bible that this stuff WILL WORK FOR YOU TOO. Try it. I promise. My arthritis symptoms are completely improved. No More Pain!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry McLeod

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE "COUNT FOR CAPS FOR ACCURACY"
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this for years. Worls well for my fibromyalgia and arthritis and buldging hernieted discs. However, I have noticed the last few months, Inam running out at around 20 days vs 30 days. It leads me to believe the co is not putting full amount inside. COUNT THEM UPON ARRIVAL. Im going to try a different brand that gives more for your monet 2 month supply. I may be back but BEWARE, not lasting as long as it used to and i have been a faithful buyer for about 4 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Monnie

customer_reviews.title: Works for my arthritis pain!
customer_reviews.text: I began using turmeric powder after speaking with a family member who swears it has allowed her to stop taking prescribed medicine for arthritis. I ordered some from a different company with no noticeable change. I tried Schwartz brand next and within 10 days, I began to feel less arthritic pain in my hands. I've since ordered my second bottle and if the improvements continue, I will also continue this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Angler

customer_reviews.title: Value of Bio Schwartz vs Amazon brand is a joke
customer_reviews.text: Let's do some math... Bio Schwartz: 1350 mg of turmeric x .03% ( 3% of turmeric is curcuminoids, the whole reason we consume this product) + 150 mg of turmeric extract = 190.5 mg of curcuminoids. So 190.5 mg per dose x 30 doses = 5,715 mg of curcuminoids in one bottle. Amazon Elements Turmeric complex: 400 mg of curcuminoids x 65 doses = 26,000 mg of curcuminoids in one bottle. So a 5,750 mg bottle vs a 26,000 mg bottle is a no brainer. They're relatively the same price, both contain 10 mg of piperine, and the Amazon elements even has 140 mg of ginger root while the Bio Schwartz has no ginger root at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Sent back. Does not measure up to Vimerson health brand. Thought I’d try it for a lower price and felt horribly achy and stiff until I rush ordered my old brand back.
customer_reviews.author: J Phillips

customer_reviews.title: All of my arthritis symptoms have disappeared. I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: All of my arthritis symptoms have disappeared. I needed surgery on one of my fingers for trigger finger and after taking this product for 2 months, I no longer need surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Research Bioperine before taking this product, or any other product containing Bioperine. Scary stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod Webb

customer_reviews.title: Brands are different. Fifth brand tried and finally getting some relief.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried four other brands of circumin. I have hashimoto's auto immune disease as well as numberous food sensitivities and have been suffering with pain in most of my joints for more than a year. When I woke up after taking your product for two weeks, there was a difference in my range of motion in my neck which has been the stiffest part. I have already recommended it to a friend with scoriatic arthritis. I was just about to give up on the supplement altogether but your product is different. Thank you for my pain relief and all the other wonderful things that are happening that I am not as aware of. I would recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Rena K Walker

customer_reviews.title: Inflammation came back
customer_reviews.text: A couple years ago I was having issues with inflammation in my elbow. Per recommendation I started taking Turmeric daily. Within a few weeks my inflammation seemed to have disappeared (unless I forgot to take the turmeric for a few days). Over the 2 years I had used 2 different brands of turmeric. Both seemed to have worked well. Recently I tried this new Turmeric that was recommended by Amazon. Unfortunately while taking the new turmeric my inflammation came back. It appears this brand of Turmeric proved ineffective for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Went through me like Sherman took Atlanta.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work, I have arthritis in my hands and wanted something natural to help with inflammation. I started taking the recommended dosage, 3 capsules a day with food. Thank goodness I was home because I was running to the bathroom every 20 minutes with diarrhea. Not to be gross but I could not trust a fart, either. Im going to wait a week and then try introducing a tiny bit of this at a time, and see if that works, 3 caps a day all at once was bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well against arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandpa who has severe arthritis in his knees. Lately he has been very stationary and not moving enough because he is in pain. After a week of continually using this product he gets a least 5,000 steps per day on his pedometer and goes to the gym four times a week. He calls me and tells me he wakes up with no pain and stays pain free throughout the day. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Warner

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I have sciatica nerve it runs from my hip to my thigh. I have pain all the time. Since I have been taking Turmeric/Curcumin, its been wonderful...no pain most of the time. I am afraid not to keep taking it. I showed my Arthritis Doctor and he said that it was good and for me to keep taking it as long as I need to.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: If you want the anti-inflammatory properties of curcumin I suggest you try a different brand. 150mg of CURCUMIN could be written less boldly on the bottle. I tried an entire bottle with no effect. Come to find out, this is not nearly enough curcumin for me to experience it's positive effects. Classic case of mislabelling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement!!!
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I have been taking this product for a month and it seems to be helping us both. I have not had any back pain and my husband has not had to take over the counter pain meds. We just ordered another bottle!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyesha R.

customer_reviews.title: Pain free after 1 week.
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. The pain in my hands from osteoarthritis is virtually gone. I work with my hands so I am very happy I found something that works.
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: 1500mg.? misleading, everyone else's states mg's per ...
customer_reviews.text: 1500mg. ?misleading ,everyone else's states mg's per cap,this brand says most potent but you must take 3 caps to get 1500mgs .why not say 500mgs per cap??????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it! It has helped with BOTH my RA ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on the advice of my medical doctor to treat my Rhumatoid Arthritis. I LOVE it! It has helped with BOTH my RA and palmar pustular psoriasis. It eases joint pain just as well as naproxin.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Insomnia !
customer_reviews.text: Taking this for osteoarthritis in knees but after taking it for only 3 days it has given me terrible insomnia which i never have. I'm writing this at 8:30 in the morning after being up all night. Will stop taking it and see if sleeping is better. Will go back to my regular brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Silverstone

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical of the five star reviews
customer_reviews.text: Am skeptical of many of the top reviews. This company offers a free second bottle in exchange for a five star review. Am sure it has legitimately helped some, but many may be just after the free second bottle. I have tried starting this product four times over the last few months. Each time I start, it feels as though the flu is coming on; headache, chills, body aches, congestion. The symptoms disappear a few days after stopping. There must be some additive in this product that my body reacts to. Have not had this issue with other turmeric brands. Disappointed and discarding this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tumeric Curcumin with Bioperine
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking your supplement for almost a year now. I was diagnosed with Fallopian tube/Ovarian cancer in February of this year and it's been the hardest year of my life. I believe in this supplement and will continue taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R. Libner

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I developed a bad case of costochondritis and I have been taking these to help with the inflammation. In my case, they work tremendously. I only take 1 a day, but if I skip a few days my chest and rib cage start hurting again. Very pleased with this product! It even came with an opportunity to get a free bottle - cool! Easy to swallow and no taste. If you found my review helpful, please click Yes below! :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: but for some there may be a better, more cost effective option out there
customer_reviews.text: Buyers should be aware that if you are looking for therapeutic curcumin that there is only 150mg in a three capsule dose in this product. There are other brands on the market with over 500mg in one tablet. I have no complaints about the quality of this product, but for some there may be a better, more cost effective option out there, especially if you want the maximum amount of curcumin (like I do, for joint pain/inflammation). I like that this brand has bioperine in it, but this can also be accomplished by adding pepper to your diet. I'm switching to a different brand, despite the tempting offers for free product (for a good review).
customer_reviews.author: HLSSteiness

customer_reviews.title: Tested positive for heavy metals: lead, arsenic, cadmium
customer_reviews.text: I just read on ConsumerLab.com in their recent (2019) study done on brands of Turmeric supplements that the BioSchwartz brand tested positive for heavy metals: lead, arsenic and cadmium. I threw away all my capsules from this brand and will be buying another. "First, do no harm," comes to mind. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica LeoGrrl

customer_reviews.title: Schwartz is my preferred brand
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with Schwartz Bioresearch turmeric curcumin. I use turmeric as an anti-inflammatory. I have tried three other brands, but Schwartz makes the most noticeable difference in assisting with joint pain and mental clarity.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: Raw is better
customer_reviews.text: Not very good for health. Will never buy any of these again. Dried turmeric has lost most of the enzymes and useful chemicals. I now just buy raw turmeric and add a crushed one inch peice to my tea with a peice of ginger. Best. For flue and fever, I add turmeric, ginger, honey and basil leaves and sip it twice a day. Cured in 24 hours. Raw turmeric is the best.
customer_reviews.author: BTLOMS

customer_reviews.title: Great product, however, WAY too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I feel the pain in my joints have alleviated and when even I have general aches and pains I fee it is effective. However, with the price jumping from $19.89 when I purchased it in October 2017. To $49.99 in July 2018, I feel like its price gouging and I will NOT be purchasing it again at a more than 50% mark up. I have been doing my research and there are definitely other brands out there. It is a shame they lost what could have been a long time repeat customer in me. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used MSM for years as an anti-inflammatory, but began searching for a different supplement when the MSM at 3000mg dosage began causing gastro issues. There's tons of research out there about the effectiveness of this as an anti-inflammatory. I had tried another brand with not much success, and was pleased at the dosage and the enhanced bioavailability for this brand. I'm sold! I take an antii-inflammatory because i have recurring middle back pain as well as being gluten sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: betterinthemountains

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking turmeric for a month now and after about a week I felt the releave from my sciatic lower back pain and the nerve pinching, I even stopped taking over the counter and prescribed meds!
customer_reviews.author: Elba R. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: 6 Capsules a Day?
customer_reviews.text: The label shown on amazon says a serving size is 3 capsules a day, which I wasn’t too happy about because, like most people, I do take other supplements. However, upon ordering it I see that the actual box says to take 3 capsules 1 or 2 times a day! Well, is it 1, or is it 2? Frankly, 6 capsules of any one supplement is an awful lot to be taking, especially when taking others. They need to make this stronger so fewer capsules are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Read the label carefully for this product. The title ...
customer_reviews.text: Read the label carefully for this product. The title "Turmeric Curcumin" might lead you to think that what's being sold is essentially curcumin derived from turmeric. In fact, (and this requires the taking of three (3) capsules), each capsule contains, by weight, 9 times as much turmeric (such as you can buy in an ordinary grocery store) as it does "turmeric extract," and even that is not pure curcumin, but rather "95% standardized curcuminoids." Other products out there have a much higher percentage of pure curcumin. Turmeric itself is only 2 - 4% curcumin.
customer_reviews.author: swimjay

customer_reviews.title: Inflammation
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product to anyone has inflammation inside their body. I have 2 auto- immune diseases and both cause inflammation. I also have malabsorption and this is why i choose this product because it has Bioperine. I love that it is Non-GMO, has no fillers or binders, that it is Third party tested & made in the USA!!! Most other products do not have these qualities all in 1 bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Fiji

customer_reviews.title: Product does not relieve pain — company does not honor their “Free Bottle to new customers” claim
customer_reviews.text: If there was a zero star rating for pain relief, I would have given it to this product. After using this product for back and joint pain for over two months, I found that it does not help at all. Also, my continued requests for the free bottle that they offered to new customers were ignored. Based on these experiences, I would not order supplements or anything else from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Sinless Coyote

customer_reviews.title: This product is far better than opioids pain killers that make you high and ...
customer_reviews.text: I took these pills and I was in pain. My pain went away and I now can do stuff that I found impossible before got started. This product is far better than opioids pain killers that make you high and don't have a care! I will recommend this product to anyone with pain!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Super great product.....!
customer_reviews.text: I had to have a right hip replacement and neck fusion surgery as a result of a car accident years ago. Bottom line is I tried every med for pain and inflammation from my doctor with no long term pain relieve. I tried Schwartz Bioresearch 1500 mg of Tumeric with Bioperine and my life has changed as my pain is literally gone and I am more active and outgoing. Great..Great... Product!! I will continue to take this product from now on!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ROBBIN C.

customer_reviews.title: Deception!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even if this product is as good as the manufacturer claims it is, there is a huge marketing deception ripping off customers. The ad says "1500 mg....max allowed dosage". However, when I received the product, the bottle says that each capsule is only 500 mg dosage and one has to swallow 3 capsules to hit "1500 mg". This is purely a misleading, money grabbing, deceitful practice. AMAZON should ask this company to stop this misleading claim and hence cheating with no shame.
customer_reviews.author: michael inbasekaran

customer_reviews.title: HIGHEST QUALITY TURMERIC I HAVE USED
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this Turmeric. I have tried 3 other brands and gave up on them because they were not effective (one was more expensive). It has helped reduce the pain in my knee to the point that I can tolerate it and stop the Hydrocodone. It has also helped the osteoarthritis in my hip (along with external DMSO) so that I can tolerate the pain and not need hip replacement. I am subscribing for a monthly delivery. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: mexrph

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have Rheumatoid Arthritis, and I was taking a medication that was Ok, however, my co-pay went up to $ 2.500.00 for this medication alone every 6 weeks. Obviously I couldn't afford it. I had to start taking pain killers again. I've decided to try Turmeric, and 2 weeks after I started to take Turmeric Curcumin, the pain started to go away and the inflammation on my hands was finally over. I couldn't believe it; how strong my hands feel now. Usually I don't believe in supplements, but the Turmeric Curcumin change my concept. I now started taking the Garcinia Cambogia, to lose weight, and it does suppress the appetite!!! Unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.author: the IT man

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how effective it really was until I ran out. I suffer from fibromyalgia, and arthritis in both shoulders. When in rare form, the pain cripples me for days. A close friend who has Lupus and Rheumatoid arthritis, recommended this product to me. So I thought I'd try it; I ordered one (1) bottle. I did notice that I didn't have as many bouts of pain while taking it. I didn't appreciate or pay much attention to the new freedom I was having, until there was none left. Each day my pain got worse. I had to wait until payday to reorder; this time, I ordered more than one bottle. Next payday, the subscription!
customer_reviews.author: mjbandit26

customer_reviews.title: Have to TakeToo Many Tablets a Day to be Effective
customer_reviews.text: Product does not contain 1500mg of 95% standardized curcuminoids per tablet, only 150mg--the remaining 1350mg of turmeric is a waste. This product has little or no effect compared to another product I have been using--I would have to take 5 tablets daily to get the equivalent of 1 tablet of another product I have been taking for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: quick results
customer_reviews.text: Did you know that literally thousands of published, peer-reviewed studies conducted and compiled over the years lend credence to the notion that turmeric works the same as, or even better than, at least 14 pharmaceutical drugs currently on the market? Including steroids, antidepressants, aspirin, anti-imflammatory drugs, some chemotherapy drugs, diabetes drugs, etc. I've been taking this for a couple months now and feel like a different person. I am more awake in the mornings and in a better mood...and I haven't been sick at all, even though I've been surrounded by sick people. This product has made me an advocate for turmeric
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Dark Orange???
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try these after reading the great reviews. Well, I was sadly disappointed when I opened them, they had an odd smell and the capsules were a much darker color than my normal bright orange turmeric that I take. I only tried one bottle, so I am not sure what caused the dark color and smell, but I am going back to my favorite turmeric that I have been using for yearsI know that this turmeric is always bright orange and contains the true 95% curcuminoids along with bioperine for enhanced absorption. – plus the Nutratech Turmerch is a much better value costing over $1 less and containing 120 capsules!
customer_reviews.author: orangethemeow

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, NOT REAL TURMERIC, POSSIBLY LEAD
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these exact turmeric capsules before and they've been fine but I opened a new bottle to find the color of the capsules was red-brown! When I opened the capsule to see what the powder substance was inside, it did not taste like or look like turmeric at all!! Turmeric should be yellow - not red/brown. Attached is a picture of the last two capsules I had from my previous bottle (bright yellow capsules) and a handful of the new bottle's capsules (red-brown). I'm alarmed and need a refund. PLEASE DO NOT BUY, THIS IS NOT TURMERIC.
customer_reviews.author: deeps

customer_reviews.title: Best I have used thus far
customer_reviews.text: I have taken Tumeric over the years and tried different brands. I switched to this brand and have used it for a while now and this one seems to benefit me more than the others I have tried. I recently started a culling process of things I was using that seemed to have no benefit as this gets expensive after a while. This one made the cut due to the benefits I get from taking it. The quality is good and the price is a fair price for good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Not just Turmeric in this!
customer_reviews.text: The dosage on this, 3 pills, triples my normal dosage for turmeric that I’ve been using for 3 years now. So, taking one pill as MY dose. These won’t work for me though; I think it is the addition of the black pepper fruit extract. Took one a day for 3 days and every one of those days had horrible heartburn and chest tightness that eventually led to vomiting. Will be throwing them out. Other people may not have this reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Caused severe abdominal pain after 2 days of ingesting. Never had any other Turmenic cause seve abdominal pain like this. Can’t take product and too late for refund
customer_reviews.author: susan mccaughtry

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by this cancer survivor
customer_reviews.text: Great anti-inflammatory Stage 4 neck cancer survivor CT scan 6 weeks ago showed reoccurrence of tumor on backside of tonsil. Started taking this product daily for 4 weeks and latest CT scan revealed tumor is gone! Tumeric is extremely helpful when battling any cancer and I have found the anti-inflammatory benefits 2nd to none with no side effects.
customer_reviews.author: DOVIE ORNDORFF

customer_reviews.title: Very weak over price too
customer_reviews.text: Use powder organic turmeric with powder black peper 1 teaspoon turmeric quater teaspoon black peper empty tummy. Add 1 tablespoon cold press olive oil 100 time stronger and cheapper than this pill.
customer_reviews.author: notolerancefordishonesty

customer_reviews.title: BIOPENE = Serious HeartBurn!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've taken Turmeric products before in the form of Tea with ginger or green tea and had great results. After the zing of 5 star reviews I joined the band wagon on this product. Unfortunately the BIOPENE or PEPPER in this product caused me to have serious heartburn also I felt zero benefits related to inflammation. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: stephon m.brooks jr

customer_reviews.title: These are nice with high potency and easy absorption - but expensive since some capsules are empty
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different brands of curcumin and I can't say that this is any better than the last, but the price was right ... until I got toward the bottom of the bottle and there are three (YES, THREE!) empty capsules. While this can happen to any filled capsules, the product is usually on the bottom of the container. Not so here. No curcumin loose in the container. Is this how they make their money? They tell quality control to allow empty gel capsules in the containers so that they can make a bigger profit? I'm not going to buy this one again... I won't take the chance since their quality control has no quality or control.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended for me to take this in leu of Advil or Aleve for some hamstring pain I was having. After a month of taking it; my blood pressure dropped drastically and I started having vertigo, lightheadedness. I didn’t think it was this supplement, neither did the doctor. But; when I discontinued it, I started to improve. I have taken it on and off since then and to no avail, I get dizzy...check my blood pressure and it’s low (80/48). This would be a great supplement for someone needing to lower blood pressure. But be careful and listen to your body.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: This particular product is the best I've tried and I've been using turmeric for 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic pain associated with fibromyalgia. Turmeric helps with my joint inflammation and pain. This particular product is the best I've tried and I've been using turmeric for 3 years. Been using this brand for a few months now and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: No longer worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for $18 per bottle/30 day supply. But will not be repurchasing at almost $50 per bottle/30 day supply. Looking for a different brand now.
customer_reviews.author: SCDG

customer_reviews.title: I see no difference
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a tumeric supplement to help with the aches an pains of sports and general manual labor. The product I was told about is always sold out, so I tried this one, which had most of the ingredients of that product. I have been using this about one month now and I notice zero difference from before I took it at all. I'll give it two stars because I like the taste of my burps about 10 minutes after ingesting them.
customer_reviews.author: gary assassin

customer_reviews.title: Improved digestion
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Schwartz Turmeric Curcumin for about 30 days and I have seen a vast improvement in my IBS. I had been dealing with too frequent bowel movements, intestinal pain and a change in my diet. Before I started taking this product I could no longer eat most dark green vegetables without have diarrhea. I am now able to eat salad and other vegetable that I had removed from my diet. Because of my age I still have to watch the kinds of foods I eat but I definitely have seen improvements in my body. I also noticed an improvement in my blood pressure. I rarely need my medication which I am thankful for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One serving equals three capsules.
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried these yet, but the description, at least as of March 2019, is misleading: "HIGHEST POTENCY AVAILABLE TURMERIC PILLS ENHANCED WITH BIOPERINE: BioSchwartz Turmeric formula has 1500mg of Turmeric Curcumin with 95% Standardized Curcuminoids per serving (Highest Potency) and 10mg of BioPerine (black pepper, curcumin with black pepper) aiding in enhanced absorption and bio-availability." Note that a "serving" is three capsules, not one. To say "highest potency" is not true with respect to one pill.
customer_reviews.author: James Alec

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I am 68 and been on this product for almost 2 years. I have bone on bone in my left hip and almost the same in my right knee. My doctor recommended taking Turmeric Curcumin with a high dose of Omega 3's. I couldn't get my foot one inch off the ground to put on my shoe it hurt so MUCH. I was getting Cortisone injections in both and was seriously considering hip replacement. Now I can cross both legs and lift my leg (hip side) up past my waist. I haven't gotten injections for almost a year, and am pain free. I know I will eventually need the replacements, but for now I feel great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was taking another curcumin product for about three years for my arthritis that I have mostly in my cervical area. It started not work any longer I could not stay asleep since my neck started to hurt again and after researching what else I could take, I came across this product from Schwartz, stating it had Bioperine added of which made curcumin absorbed in the body. I tried it and after a couple of days my pain and discomfort started to subside. Started to take it on Spetember 26, 2016 and now I have to say, I no longer have the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Natural Wonder
customer_reviews.text: I've suffered from severe GERD for more than 15 years. My heartburn can trigger just from drinking water. I wake up choking from liquid magma. I have tried every thing known for my GERD. Heartburn meds like Prilosec and Zantac reduce the acid too much in your stomach. You need a good balance of acid in the stomach, plus natural remedies are always better than synthetic man made crap. The body takes in nutrients through the stomach acid. Too little and a person can become vitamin and mineral deficient. Turmeric is the only thing that has stopped my heartburn. It also promotes immune function
customer_reviews.author: sean c riggs

customer_reviews.title: More effective than ever imagined.
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to help my wife with her back issues. But I never expected it to work so well that after one week she no longer takes her prescription medicine for her back. It's been 3 weeks and for the first time in years she is pain free! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Wareham

customer_reviews.title: not for my use
customer_reviews.text: can't rate this is for my mother. she has seen that her veins have shrunk some but she has to test it out for 4 months. Since this is the second month we don't have answer as to if this will help her pain or not. Perhaps in a couple of months we will know. She does not want to use opioids for obvious reasons and this was suggested. We are waiting to see if they help decrease her intense pain
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wilbury

customer_reviews.title: The effects are real
customer_reviews.text: I have Ankylosing Spondylitis with a positive test for the gene HLA-B27. I stopped taking Celebrex because of side effects and decided to try a more natural approach. I read where Tumeric Curcumin had helped many people, I read many articles and all were impressive on what this could and does do. I searched on Amazon for Turmeric Curcumin and came accross this product, I take 3 pills two times a day with a meal (and the meal has to have fat in it, not alot but no zero fat stuff, because body absorption is more effective). The effects are real, it is better for me then the 400mg of Celebrex ever was. (Sorry Celebrex, the truth is the truth)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At least for me, it actually CAUSED inflammation in my hands and knuckles.
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this because I know Tumeric is supposed to help with inflammation among other things. But at least in my case, it actually caused a flare-up of some old inflammation issues with some of the joints in my hands. I only took it for two weeks and then had to stop. Admittedly, maybe the issue was limited to me. Everyone responds differently to things like this.
customer_reviews.author: TommyBoyChicago

customer_reviews.title: Turmeric Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I had heard of the Company Schwartz and trusted that brand. After taking the supplement three times a day for just two days I started vomiting a few times each morning. I have found that turmeric curcumin should include ginger for digestion help and this brand does not include ginger. While I think this is a good product I will return it because it is making me sick each day and purchase a brand that includes ginger.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Franks

customer_reviews.title: Great inflammation and pain management
customer_reviews.text: I have a toe injury and am still rehabbing from knee surgery earlier this year (partial meniscectomy) so I get pain and inflammation with my workouts involving my left toe and knee; I seem to have replaced NSAIDS with Turmeric Curcumin as I have not taken any NSAIDS since I started this product. Time will tell, but I can say that my inflammation pain is minimal now. My chiropractor advised me to bump up my dose which I will start doing this week and see what happens. I am quite encouraged by the initial results.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Klein

customer_reviews.title: Severe Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I started with one capsule in the morning and after a week started taking another one in the evening as well. Did fine for a few weeks. I did see a difference in my inflammation and pain but then started having severe Diarrhea, was going to the bathroom 10 times or so and the stomach really hurt after a few days of experiencing this it was intolerable and I stopped, this was only with 2 capsules a day, God alone knows what would have happened with the recommended dosage of 3 twice a day!!
customer_reviews.author: ECHOECHO

customer_reviews.title: Living Alive and Healthy
customer_reviews.text: I will make this quick, I use this product and it does help me, I use as a tea in the morning and I notice the difference in my body and when it wears off I notice the difference in my body. I was looking to buy more but it is out of stock, went to the Bil Schwartz web site and all of their products are sold out. It made me wonder if someones are causing problems for this company because they are helping people. I will be praying for the company that none of their products change formulas. Something is just not right. We know there are those who don't want healthy people' God help us.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Inflammation is gone!!
customer_reviews.text: This truly works. I'm very much a sceptic. I bought this after a conversation with someone who raved about it. I have a lot of inflammation from arthritis and carpal tunnel in my right wrist to the point that my hand goes numb quite often. Doctor said it's only a mild case so surgery is out of the question. After taking this for a week, I definitely felt the difference and within a month all my inflammation was pretty much gone. I'll never go a day without it. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: edibleart

customer_reviews.title: My husband who has had 3 back surgeries and is in constant pain was amazed at the relief he felt when taking these pills
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic but after taking these pills for my sciatica pain and joint pain I am now a believer! This pill does exactly what it says it will do. I experienced no side effects. My husband who has had 3 back surgeries and is in constant pain was amazed at the relief he felt when taking these pills. It is something we do daily and I highly recommend those who have pain from inflammation please give this product a try. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to lower inflammation from fibromyalgia. I’ve been taking it for 3 weeks and have noticed a big difference. I used to take 3 Advil every morning just to function and I haven’t had an Advil in more than a week now. I’m a fan!
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get what I ordered - tampered?
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product several times over the past 3 years and have been very pleased. However, today I received an order that was unusual. It was not in a sealed box (like normal), and when I opened it up, I only had 19 pills (not the 90 that I usually get). At this point, I’m paying $1 a pill for only 6 days of dosage. I’m hoping someone can help me and correct this mistake. Again, I’ve been pleased with your product for 3 years and not sure what has happened this time.
customer_reviews.author: Charity D

customer_reviews.title: Knock Off Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been subscribing this for years never had a problem. Works well for joint pain. However this month’s subscribe and save package sent me a clearly knock off product: 1. No box outside the bottle. 2. Plastic bottle was warped and clearly made of cheaper plastic. 3. Moisture pack inside is different. 4. Label front and color are subtlety different. 5. Capsules inside are Of different color and smell. Also checked with Bioschwartz. They did not change packaging. Tumeric supplements are known to have dangerous contaminants if not sources well. Not taking any chances with my health. Now I am subscribing directly from Bioschwartz. Also contacted Amazon customer service; gave me some BS about frustration free packaging. Not stupid no thanks!
customer_reviews.author: fgy1728

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our doctor
customer_reviews.text: My husband started taking this on the advice of his doctor, who said he himself takes Tumeric on a daily basis. My husband's CPK levels were high. He also had some joint pain from arthritis and complaints of hip pain after a fall. He had his CPK levels checked again after 30 days and they were within the normal limits. Also he has noticed an improvement in his joints and hip. I also began taking it daily with him for neck pain and I feel this has helped with my condition also. I would highly recommend this product. We've had no adverse side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Swidgen

customer_reviews.title: When your knees a rockin',don't come a knockin'!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 63 year old mother in law. After 3 days of taking the recommended dosage, she was back on her feet mowing the lawn and feeding her 75 chickens! She used to ache when it would ran or if she'd been out shopping for a bit. But now, she's keeping up with us while doing our farm chores. It's amazing to she her happy doing the things she always loved doing! By the way, she had knee replacement surgery 3 years ago and she says this has helped her waaay more than the surgery did!
customer_reviews.author: Leka

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product, soaking wet box!
customer_reviews.text: Received my package today and threw it away, as you can see in the pictures, it looks like someone picked it out of their garbage and it’s been passed around, the box was soaking wet, it fell apart when I picked it up, yet inside the shipping box it was completely dry! It had packing tape wrapped around it as if to hold the box together, I have no idea what happened to this bottle but there is no way I am putting this in my body, I’ll be looking for a different brand altogether!
customer_reviews.author: AMN63

customer_reviews.title: wondering why it sucks compared to other curcumin products - check the dosage!
customer_reviews.text: this product is 95% NOT curcumin extract. it is 95% tumeric and a small amount (150mg) curcuminoids. which explains why it sucks compared to the last type i took.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Bananas

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product successfully for a few years to treat arthritis pain and inflammation. There have been problems with the last few shipments. The yellow capsules have become noticeably darker and have a strong mildew odor. According to Bioschwartz customer rep "Carlos," the region where the product is grown has received heavy rain so the color variation is normal. I can buy the color variation, but not the odor. The packaging has also been an issue. The product is no longer boxed and the plastic bottles were "crumpled," with the seal broken on one of the bottles (It was returned for a replacement - Thanks Amazon.) Time to try a different product.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Only one month in.  Diminished joint  pain!
customer_reviews.text: Works really wonderful for me! joint pain seriously diminished quickly! I now have hubby on the bandwagon Tumeric Curcumin every day. Part of our regime for us now. Easy to swallow capsules. Doesn’t contain negative fillers. I’m taking three capsules per Day. I thought the positive reviews were hype until I realized wow that alongside prayer these are truly blessed and helping me.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: I am a daily user of Turmeric and it was recommended that 500mg a day is the required dose. These tablets, although boasting a 1500mg content, recommend taking them 3 times a day? I am taking them as a one-a-day supplement and hoping I am doing the right thing. If one capsule a day is the proper dosage for the average citizen these are a great bargain and a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: kathye58

customer_reviews.title: Works in my life.
customer_reviews.text: These work. Or at least the group of supplements I take work. I am mainly concerned about mental acuity and inflammation reduction/elimination. My job is mental and high stress. Requires mental agility, fast thinking, and fast response time. I take these with choline and also take resveratrol. My brother in evidence based medicine recommended them. Despite that, I gave them a try. Ha! Well he was right. It has taken several starts and stops for me to determine a correlation of my mental brilliance to maintaining my dose on my supplements. I don't like to take drugs, including supplements, but I cannot deny the results.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do a thing
customer_reviews.text: Saw loads of rave reviews for this product - but - both my wife & I dutifully took the capsules as prescribed for 2 months. And exactly nothing happened - I suppose it good that my inflammation/pain didn't get worse - but it certainly didn't get any better
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S Sayles

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended, pain significantly reduced after 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Doctor recommended to take this for disc herniation pain after a car accident. I was unable to put the dishes on the dishwasher without having to put my weight on my side and arm, due to the pain, while using one arm to load the dishes. After 2 weeks of using it, I realized that I was no longer having to bend my knees to put the dishes on the dishwasher and could actually do it without having to put my weight on my other arm and side. It is truly a miracle! It didn't get rid entirely of the pain, but what was before excruciating pain is now tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i have had arthitis for years and have tried other types of this product. they offer to send a free one if u review their product but the free one they sent was a dark brown and expiring in two weeks. Needless to say i was not impressed and stopped using this product and returned to another one that is cheaper but works well and is always the golden color turmeric should be when processed right.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I find this product (Turmeric Curcumin with Bioperine 1500mg) very effective at helping reduce pain from my moderate osteo-arthritis. I have been using two Kirkland 1,500 mg Glucosamine HCL with MSM daily for a number of years with moderate sucecss. Three years ago I added a single daily capsule of Instaflex and found noticeable further improvement in the arthritis pain and limitations in my hand and left knee. After the Amazon price for Instaflex rose 20% recently I decided to try this product (Turmeric Curcumin with Bioperine 1500mg) instead and have for 2 weeks I've been taking a single capsule daily along with my Glucosamine. This has reduced my pain and physical limitations even more.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew V

customer_reviews.title: A HUGE help
customer_reviews.text: I have residual pain post-cervical spine fusion. I can’t nor want to take NSAIDS due to a history of. TIAs. I’ve heard from friends, neighbors, and family that continued use of turmeric helps so I tried it and sure enough, it reduced my chronic nerve pain by at least 25%, but my swelling & inflammation, it disappeared!
customer_reviews.author: Polywog

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I had sharp shoulder pain especially at night and while swimming. Went to orthopedist who told me I have no cartilage left in that shoulder and he could do a complete shoulder replacement or "treat the symptoms". Another doctor had recommended tumeric so I decided to try it, although very skeptical. After a couple of months I have no pain and am able to swim laps again. I knit a lot and the thumb joint that used to bother me is almost unnoticeable. So far, so good. A side benefit is my blood pressure is much lower although it wasn't super high to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Amy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: strong curcumin with pepper extract
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I do notice some pain relief with this. I have both rheumatoid and osteo arthritis. I try not to take medicines such as ibuprofen or naproxyn as they don't help that much anyway and the risk is high. I definitely have realized a reduction in inflammation and since that is the root of most disease, great find! This company makes wonderful products and I have not had one that was a disappointment. I would recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relieves most inflammation
customer_reviews.text: I had really bad hip and gum inflammation from a possible infected root canal and it enabled me to feel better again. The hip joint pain went away and the teeth/gum inflammation went down to almost normal. I feel much better again. This product is so affordable I count my blessings because I can't afford to pay extravagant prices on supplements. This product does work. I was using Terry Naturally Curcumin before and it was draining my finances. I decided to give this product a try and I am so thankful that I did. Now I'm saving over $20 a month on supplements that help to give me a more pain-free life!
customer_reviews.author: Happy girl

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to have to swallow three capsules, not one.
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn’t expecting to have to swallow THREE capsules. The last thing I need is to swallow that many more a day. Also, in order for me to return it, they are going to take $6 off my refund when this little thing would sure not cost that if I mailed it myself. I have also since learned that if you don’t take it with a bit of some kind of oil, it won’t be absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: Thistle

customer_reviews.title: Friggin Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I purchased originally for fighting inflammation. It did that and so much more. Pain relief so amazing that it helps the throbbing headaches my husband get from TBI. He is on zero pain pills despite having 2 crainiotomies. Two weeks ago we ran out due to my mistake and he couldn't get past the pain nothing else worked. I'm sold. I could go on and on it's that amazing. I will say it helped get my hormones straight so all my menopausal symptoms went away!
customer_reviews.author: HarperLeesMockingbird

customer_reviews.title: Lower back pain cure for me!
customer_reviews.text: This has seriously been like the “magic cure” for my lower back pain, which is related to a disintegrating disc from years of sitting in sessions and completing paperwork as a mental health therapist. If I forget and don’t take it for about three days, I can tell a huge difference. For anyone who has chronic pain, I hope it works as well for you too!
customer_reviews.author: CityGirl9

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for 3 weeks. I originally bought this because I had foot surgery and I wanted to make sure I could reduce swelling and pain. Not only have I had a PAINLESS surgery, it worked for my acne too! I break out on my chest/back/ face and it is starting to clear up!!!! I 100 percent recommend buying this. I was only going to take this for 2 months for my recovery but now I am going to keep buying them. ONLY 1 CON: they smell and they have a weird taste. I take it with orange juice and block my nose!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: I would HIGHLY recommend this supplement for anyone experiencing bone
customer_reviews.text: Amanda, I bought my first bottle of your Turmeric Curcumin from Amazon on July 13 and started taking it when it arrived a couple of days later. I would give this supplement a 5+. I did not realize how well it was working until I ran out and began to once again experience lots of joint and leg pain! I reordered and received my second and third bottles (one for a friend) on Oct 16!! What a relief to have these again! I ordered 4 bottles today because I do NOT want to run any time soon! I would HIGHLY recommend this supplement for anyone experiencing bone, muscle, and joint pain. They work! Thank you! Jennifer
customer_reviews.author: jamfromOK

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I took this product for about 3 months to see what it does for inflammation and it increasingly caused intestinal issues fro me; upset stomach, nausea and constant low grade stomach pain/discomfort. I had to stop taking this supplement. All symptoms disappeared once I stopped taking this product. I really don't know if I had a reaction to Turmeric or Bioperine.. I am happy it works for some people, didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Irina E.

customer_reviews.title: Inflammation Gone!!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from osteoarthritis, and I have lots of problems with my spine. I had so much inflammation throughout my body, I was actually retaining pounds of fluid from it! I did some research and found that Tumeric and Curcumin are great natural inflammatories. I ordered the Healthy Choices brand and with months I was free from so much body inflammation. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with packaging
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this many times and it always came in a sealed box. This was just a bottle. The seal seems to be intact around the neck of the bottle but I am NOT pleased that it wasn't in a sealed box.
customer_reviews.author: MewsMama

customer_reviews.title: The company has very good customer service
customer_reviews.text: After only two days I felt a difference in my knee pain. Less stiffness and less discomfort going up or down stairs. However this initial effect seems to have diminished some. They advise 4 weeks of continuous use which I will definitely do and I remain optimistic. The company has very good customer service. I do not have any stomach or reflux issues with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

product_meta.title: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 1500mg. Highest Potency Available. Premium Joint & Healthy Inflammatory Support with 95% Standardized Curcuminoids. Non-GMO, Gluten Free Capsules with Black Pepper
feature_bullets: HIGHEST POTENCY AVAILABLE TURMERIC PILLS ENHANCED WITH BIOPERINE: BioSchwartz Turmeric formula has 1500mg of Turmeric Curcumin with 95% Standardized Curcuminoids per serving (Highest Potency) and 10mg of BioPerine (black pepper, curcumin with black pepper) aiding in enhanced absorption and bio-availability.

ALL NATURAL, NON-GMO, NO FILLERS, BINDERS OR PRESERVATIVES: Our professional grade Turmeric with BioPerine (curcumin with BioPerine) is a natural turmeric powder and has better absorption compared to common turmeric teas. Our Curcumin is also FREE Of soy, gluten, milk, egg, wheat, GMOs, peanuts, sweeteners, shellfish and sugar.

PROFESSIONALLY FORMULATED & MADE IN USA: Our Turmeric extract is formulated by professionals and manufactured in the USA following strict GMP guidelines. Our Turmeric with BioPerine is third party tested to assure the highest quality and purity of each batch.

HIGHEST QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Not only is our Turmeric Curcumin supplement potent, but we also use patented BioPerine (10mg per serving) to aid in increased absorption and bioavailability. Through industry research, we believe that Turmeric with black pepper is essential in good turmeric curcumin supplements. We only use pure and raw ingredients in all our formulas.

100% SATISFACTION - MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We want you to be fully satisfied! That’s why we back every order with our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee so you can shop with confidence. If you are not satisfied with our product, you are protected by our no questions asked, money-back guarantee.
